thread.title: IT raids at Vijay, Nayan and Samantha's homes
thread.title_full: IT raids at Vijay, Nayan and Samantha's homes - The Times of India

author: timesofindia.indiatimes.com
title: IT raids at Vijay, Nayan and Samantha's homes
text:
With Vijay's 'Puli' set to hit the screens tomorrow, the Income Tax department has conducted raids at actor Vijay's house. Surprise searches were conducted at the houses and offices of Nayanthara and Samantha as well. According to sources, a total of 32 places were raided in Tamil Nadu, Kerala and Hyderabad.
"The raids were conducted following reports that some investment made in 'Puli' is unaccounted for," said a source. The IT sleuths also raided the houses of the producers of Vijay's forthcoming Tamil film 'Puli'. The film, a big-budget fantasy drama, is believed to be the most expensive film in the career of superstar Vijay.
